definition: to deliver a frontal assault/to meet head-on (idiom)
to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The Federals kept on coming long past the point where all the pleasure of whipping them vanished.
sentences.chinese: 迎頭痛擊的樂趣早已消失，北軍仍在衝鋒。

sentences.english: They made head against the enemy.
We gave the intruders a hot welcome .
sentences.chinese: 我們給予侵略者迎頭痛擊。

sentences.english: He treated the strategy of the hostile general like a citadel, and made a breach in it.
sentences.chinese: 他把敵軍將領的戰略，看成一個堡壘，加以迎頭痛擊。

sentences.english: If the enemy dares to invade us, we'll deal them head-on blows.
sentences.chinese: 敵人膽敢進犯，我們就給予迎頭痛擊。
